Daily Crime & CSA Logs



TTU Lubbock Campus

Please use the drop down options under “Select Area” to view the Police Department Crime Log or the Campus Secutity Authority Crime Log. The print button below will print the current log selection. If you would like to print both the police and CSA log as one combined document, please click the combined logs button.
